item.title: 3 potholes getting bigger, 9th February
item.description:
These 3 potholes have been here approximately 4 weeks now getting bigger with the rain and cole weather getting bigger and deeper on the speed hump been repaired this patch for about 6 years and still doesn't last
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sewell Road, Abbey Wood

item.title: This abandoned van makes loud beeping sounds all night, 9th February
item.description:
This vehicle has been abandoned for over 5 months. For the second night in a row it's making very loud beeping sounds that are audible on the whole street. It's most probably due to some battery issue or sensor failure. It's impossible to sleep like this.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): St Johns Park, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet
